colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component

iconSpacing.description: The space between the button icon and label.

isActive.description: If `true`, the button will be styled in its active state.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the button will be disabled.

isLoading.description: If `true`, the button will show a spinner.

leftIcon.description: If added, the button will show an icon before the button's label.

loadingText.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
  | ReactFragment
  | ReactPortal
loadingText.description:
The label to show in the button when `isLoading` is true
If no text is passed, it only shows the spinner

rightIcon.description: If added, the button will show an icon after the button's label.

spinner.description: Replace the spinner component when `isLoading` is set to `true`

spinnerPlacement.description: It determines the placement of the spinner when isLoading is true
